NAME: resolution
notes: if extended then date of resolution

NAME: crit1
notes: Criterion 1: POLITICAL, ECONOMIC, RELIGIOUS, OR SOCIAL GOAL (CRIT1)

NAME: attacktype1
notes: type of attack, most important/goal supersedes others

NAME: individual
notes: If 1 then likely perps not affiliated with specific org

NAME: claimmode_txt
notes: txt of claim mode (letter, call pre, call post incident, email, video, note…)

NAME: compclaim
notes: more than one group claimed separate responsibility

NAME: divert
notes: if hostages/kidnapping-→ where perps diverted/moved hostages to

NAME: ransomnote
notes: supplemental notes on ransom request (avail after 1997)
